thread.title: George W. Bush lashes out at 'racism' in the Trump era | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: George W. Bush lashes out at 'racism' in the Trump era | Daily Mail Online

author: Francesca Chambers
title: George W. Bush lashes out at 'racism' in the Trump era | Daily Mail Online
text: George W. Bush lashes out at 'racism' in the Trump era as he says, 'I don't like the name-calling' George W. Bush is speaking out as part of his promotion of Portraits in Courage Said he doesn't like the political climate that accompanied Donald Trump - calling it 'pretty ugly - but says it will pass Revealed that Trump doesn't call him for advice, and neither did Obama Former president said he'll find a way to bring in Muslims from the Middle East to participate in programs at the Bush Center Wouldn't comment directly this week on Trump's travel ban Published: 15:00 GMT, 28 February 2017 | Updated: 15:37 GMT, 28 February 2017 251 shares
